meanings.definition: Moving or capable of moving at a very high speed.
meanings.sent1: The cheetah is superfast when chasing its prey.
meanings.sent2: The superfast train arrived at the station before anyone expected.
meanings.sent3: The superfast squirrel zipped through the trees, leaving the other animals in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her superfast reflexes allowed her to catch the falling glass before it shattered.
meanings.sent5: The superfast spaceship zoomed through the galaxy, leaving a trail of stardust behind.

meanings.sent1: The superfast decision was made without much thought.
meanings.sent2: The superfast response to the emergency saved many lives.
meanings.sent3: The superfast chef whipped up a delicious meal in record time.
meanings.sent4: His superfast typing skills impressed his colleagues during the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The superfast assembly line produced thousands of toys in just a few hours.

meanings.sent1: The superfast car broke the speed limit on the highway.
meanings.sent2: The superfast internet connection allowed for seamless video streaming.
meanings.sent3: The superfast roller coaster ride left everyone exhilarated and breathless.
meanings.sent4: The superfast river current carried the raft downstream in no time.
meanings.sent5: The superfast athlete crossed the finish line in a blur of speed.
